OverlayRules.title: Do you wish to download the photo to your phone?
OverlayRules.message: Any photo taken by the Photo Booth is automatically deleted after 5 minutes.

OverlayQrcode.title: Scan the QR code with your phone
OverlayQrcode.message: Select your device type below to see the instructions.
OverlayQrcode.message_android:
1. Open the phone’s camera

2. Hold the camera in front of the QR code until it is scanned.

3. Press “Connect” to connect to the Photo Booth.

4. Wait until the pop-up window shows up. This may take up to 10 seconds.

5. Hold your finger on the photo press ''Save''.
OverlayQrcode.message_iphone:
1. Open the phone’s camera

2. Hold the camera in front of the QR code until it is scanned.

3. Press “Connect” to connect to the Photo Booth.

4. When the picture appears, take a screenshot by pressing the side and volume up buttons simultaneously.

5. Open your Photos app, find your screenshot, crop it to isolate the photo, then tap the share icon to save.
OverlayQrcode.message_samsung:
1. Open the phone’s camera

2. Hold the camera in front of the QR code until it is scanned.

3. Press “Connect” to connect to the Photo Booth.

4. If a security warning appears, accept it and tap “Connect” again.

5. Open your web app and write photobooth.ml to view and save your photo.

OverlayLoading.title: CREATING MAGIC
OverlayLoading.message: Please wait. It may take a few seconds.
